Andy Coulson , who will remain in Downing Street for a fortnight, said: Unfortunately continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110% needed in this role. I stand by what I've said about those events but when the spokesman needs a spokesman it's time to move on. Andy Coulson is one of the most trusted members of David Cameron 's inner circle, with an apparent direct line to swing voters and News International.
